name: snaggled
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(of a tooth, or a row of teeth) sticking out, or not straight or regular: His eyes and his snaggled front tooth were the sort of thing that people noticed and remembered.
More examplesFewer examplesHe was self-conscious about his teeth, having a slightly snaggled right front incisor that was twisted and jutted out a little.She specialized in whitening smiles and fixing snaggled teeth.The actress went to LA, lost her snaggled Brit teeth and acquired a new bosom.She grew up in England and her teeth are thoroughly snaggled and altogether natural.
